title: Billy Baker: "We Need To Hang Out"
description: Michael speaks with Billy Baker, author of "We Need to Hang Out: A Memoir of Making Friends." Original air date 17 February 2021. The book was published on 26 January 2021.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Billy Baker, Michael Smerconish)
